resources.string: First, put chopped meats to a bowl. Second, Add some olive oil ,yoghurt,salt,thyme,onion and mix them.Then, cover bowl with a pochette and wait it in refrigator for 1 hour . After wait, take grill pan and heat it high temperature without olive oil. Put marinated meats(chickens) to pan and heat them. Finally, put materials of salad to a plate and put meats to on.
